Rewards Rate: 5X Reward Points/₹100 for IRCTC Bookings and 1 Reward Point/₹100 for Other Valid Spends. An Additional 5% Cashback Can Be Earned for Rail Bookings Via SmartBuy
Reward Redemption: The earned Cash Points can be redeemed against travel bookings via IRCTC and several other options. 1 Cash Point = up to Re. 1.
Travel: 8 Complimentary Access to IRCTC Executive Lounges (Maximum Two Each Quarter)

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The renewal fee is waived on spending Rs. 1.5 lakhs or more in the previous year.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Fuel Surcharge Waiver Up to ₹250 Each Statement Cycle
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the cash amount or Rs. 500 (whichever is higher)

product_details: Amazon voucher worth ₹500 as a welcome benefit.
1 Reward Point for every ₹100 spent on retail purchases.
Complimentary railway lounge access every year.
Spend-based waiver of the renewal fee.
